name: DORUmon
description: Dorumon is a beast-like Digimon with purple fur on most of its body. It has two large legs and two arms, each of which has three black claws, as well as a large, vulpine tail. The fur on its chest, paws, snout, and the end of its tail is white. It has two pointed ears with black stripes and two very small black wings. On its brow is a triangular red gem, indicated to be an old-style Digicore Interface. Surrounding its Digicore Interface is a grey metal strip that has the stylized characters "X" "A" "I" etched on it, with each character next to each side of the Digicore Interface, refering to the XAI System .
